TextEng: Is there something you want? If not, please stand further away. Your looks may take interest away from me.
Text: 뭔가 원하는 거 있어? 아니면 좀 떨어져 줘. 네 외모 때문에 나한테 올 관심이 줄어들잖아.

TextEng: Yes? Is there something you want? I usually only have time to speak with the ladies when I visit here.
Text: 응? 뭔가 원하는 거 있어? 여기 오면 보통 아가씨들하고만 얘기하거든.

TextEng: Greetings to you. Here, stand a bit closer. I look positively dashing next to you.
Text: 안녕. 자, 좀 더 가까이 서봐. 네 옆에 서니 내가 더 멋져 보이는군.

TextEng: Very well. Let me know if I go too fast for you.
Text: 좋아. 너무 빠르면 말해.

TextEng: Very well. I have a few moments. What is it?
Text: 좋아. 잠깐 시간 있어. 뭔데?

TextEng: Don't speak of that! People come here to get away from such talk. They might shut this place down if people get too worried.
Text: 그런 얘긴 하지 마! 사람들이 그런 얘기 피하려고 여기 오는 거야. 너무 걱정하면 여길 닫아버릴지도 몰라.

TextEng: Goodbye. Perhaps we'll talk another time.
Text: 잘 가. 다음에 또 얘기하자.

TextEng: Companionship, in whatever form that means to you. The employees here are adept in discourse, games, and are especially good at listening.
Text: 함께할 사람이지, 네가 원하는 형태로. 여기 직원들은 대화도 게임도 잘하고, 특히 얘기를 잘 들어줘.

TextEng: Suffice to say that she runs a clean, much needed establishment. You won't find anyone to badmouth her.
Text: 깨끗하고 꼭 필요한 곳을 운영한다는 것만 말해두지. 그녀를 험담하는 사람은 못 찾을 거야.

TextEng: Ophala is a saint of a woman. Anyone saying otherwise had best keep a close eye on... well, this isn't for me to talk about.
Text: 오팔라는 성녀 같은 여자야. 다르게 말하는 사람은 조심해야... 뭐, 이건 내가 할 얘기가 아니군.

TextEng: Well, greetings to you, my fair, fair lady. Would you care to share my company awhile?
Text: 오, 안녕, 정말 예쁜 아가씨군. 잠시 나와 함께할래?

TextEng: Hello there. Let's have a look at you. Nothing spectacular, but fair enough. Would you care to share my company?
Text: 안녕. 어디 보자. 대단하진 않지만 괜찮네. 나와 함께할래?

TextEng: No, no, no, you're not what I had in mind at all. Get yourself back under whatever rock you crawled from.
Text: 아니, 아니, 아니, 넌 내가 생각한 타입이 전혀 아니야. 어디서 기어 나왔든 다시 돌아가.

TextEng: Fair day to you, ma'am.
Text: 좋은 하루, 부인.

TextEng: Very well, though perhaps we'll discuss compensation later?
Text: 좋아, 나중에 보상 얘기는 하는 거지?

TextEng: That's a relief. From your tone I was worried that Ophala might have lost her taste in companions. Leave me, then.
Text: 다행이군. 말투를 보니 오팔라가 사람 보는 눈이 없어졌나 걱정했어. 그럼 가봐.

TextEng: Ah, you're an intellectual charmer as well. Very well, I'll answer what I can.
Text: 아, 지적인 매력도 있군. 좋아, 아는 데까지 답해줄게.

TextEng: Well, you certainly have a charming manner. Perhaps I can be a bit more... free with you. Very well.
Text: 뭐, 확실히 매력적인 태도군. 아마 좀 더... 편하게 얘기해도 되겠어. 좋아.

TextEng: Ehh, don't do that. You'lll put me off my supper. Sorry, but you're just not my... ah... type.
Text: 에, 그러지 마. 밥맛 떨어지게. 미안하지만 넌 내... 아... 타입이 아니야.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> I suppose it wouldn't hurt. It's not like people don't know. They just don't talk about it.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 말해도 상관없겠지. 사람들이 모르는 것도 아니고. 그냥 얘기 안 할 뿐이야.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> No, I really don't want to be making an enemy of Ophala. She's a great source of... comfort in these times.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 아니, 오팔라를 적으로 만들고 싶지 않아. 그녀는 요즘 같은 때 큰... 위안이거든.

TextEng: Ophala dabbles in... artful theft. She's arranged expensive losses for many of her detracters, though usually just as trophy victories.
Text: 오팔라는... 예술적인 도둑질을 해. 자기를 비방하는 자들에게 비싼 대가를 치르게 했지, 보통은 전리품 삼아서.

TextEng: It's a challenge to her, and I've heard of nobles playfully offering their homes as targets, though maybe they only say that after.
Text: 그녀에겐 도전이지. 귀족들이 장난삼아 자기 집을 표적으로 제공한다고 들었는데, 뭐 털리고 나서 그렇게 말하는 걸 수도 있지만.

TextEng: Okay, okay! It's not like she makes things a big secret, so there's no need to get violent. Take it easy.
Text: 알았어, 알았어! 그녀가 크게 비밀로 하는 것도 아니니까 폭력적으로 굴 필요 없잖아. 진정해.

TextEng: She doesn't do it herself, of course. She hires subtle sneaksmen, though I hear the plague has taken her favorites.
Text: 직접 하는 건 아니야, 물론. 교묘한 잠입꾼들을 고용하지. 역병이 그녀가 아끼던 사람들을 데려갔다고 들었지만.

TextEng: They know a lot about everyone, and that knowledge keeps the Moonstone Mask from being closed by the more prudish of the community.
Text: 그들은 모든 사람에 대해 많이 알고 있어. 그 정보 덕분에 월장석 가면이 깐깐한 사람들한테 문 닫히지 않는 거지.

TextEng: Bite your tongue! That would be the greatest tragedy of them all. Imagine the decline in morale from that!
Text: 입 조심해! 그건 최악의 비극일 거야. 사기가 얼마나 떨어지겠어!

TextEng: No, Ophala has taken special precautions to avoid any such worries. You'll realize that, should you decide to... partake.
Text: 아니, 오팔라는 그런 걱정 안 하게 특별히 조치해뒀어. 만약... 이용하기로 하면 알게 될 거야.

TextEng: And by what authority do you speak? Your god? There are other gods. Your laws? There are other laws.
Text: 무슨 권위로 말하는 거야? 네 신? 다른 신들도 있어. 네 법? 다른 법들도 있고.

TextEng: No one is here against their will. There is a prestige to this place, and many a great name has come just to talk with an attentive listener.
Text: 여기 누구도 억지로 온 게 아니야. 이곳엔 명성이 있고, 많은 유명인들이 그저 얘기 들어주는 사람과 대화하러 왔어.

TextEng: You won't get far around here if you damn things just because they personally offend you. That's intolerance, not morality.
Text: 자기 기분 나쁘다고 비난하면 여기선 멀리 못 가. 그건 편협함이지 도덕이 아니야.

TextEng: Nothing, but I know that I won't live in fear. I will mourn, and I may die, but I will do it at the bar with my friends and in talented company.
Text: 아무것도. 하지만 두려움에 떨며 살진 않을 거야. 슬퍼하고, 죽을 수도 있겠지만, 바에서 친구들과 함께할 거야.

TextEng: Come now, why would you want to do any such thing? You'd be taking away my only comfort in these dark times. Go on, you don't really mean it.
Text: 이봐, 왜 그런 걸 하려고 해? 이 어두운 시기에 내 유일한 위안을 빼앗는 거야. 어서, 진심이 아니잖아.

TextEng: Sorry, friend, but you are wasting your time. I've already been shaken down for every last gold I had. It's only the fine generosity of Lady Cheldarstorn that allows me to stay now.
Text: 미안하지만, 친구, 시간 낭비야. 이미 가진 금화를 다 털렸어. 지금 여기 있을 수 있는 건 순전히 켈다스토른 부인의 관대함 덕분이야.

TextEng: I'll answer questions if you have them, but I'm a stone as far as coin is concerned. I've got none to give.
Text: 질문 있으면 답해줄게, 하지만 돈에 관해서는 돌덩이야. 줄 게 없어.

TextEng: Hey... whoa, now... come on. You're kidding, right? Okay, you're not kidding. Listen, I'll give you all I got on me if you'll just leave me alone.
Text: 이봐... 잠깐... 설마. 농담이지? 알았어, 농담이 아니군. 들어봐, 날 내버려 두면 가진 거 다 줄게.

TextEng: Yeesh, what kind of a jerk are you, threatening to take away the only enjoyment I have left? Get out of here. You got what you came for. Get lost.
Text: 에휴, 넌 뭔 인간이야, 내 남은 유일한 즐거움을 빼앗겠다고 협박해? 꺼져. 원하는 거 얻었잖아. 저리 가.

TextEng: Oh no, I'm not wasting another moment on the likes of you. Why don't you go steal candy from someone else, big <man/woman>.
Text: 오 안 돼, 너 같은 놈한테 한 순간도 더 낭비 안 해. 다른 데 가서 사탕이나 빼앗아, 대단한 <man/woman> 양반.
